name: d3-tooltip-box
description: D3 plugin to build legendary tooltips

scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && browserify index.js -s d3TooltipBox -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | derequire > build/d3-tooltip-box.js
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-dev && uglifyjs build/d3-tooltip-box.js -c -m -o build/d3-tooltip-box.min.js && npm test
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-tooltip-box.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-tooltip-box.js build/d3-tooltip-box.min.js

author: roncr
